title: Received a leaver buster for a Bot game that I reconnected too.

embed.description: duroboss / Diamond 5 0LP / 131W 98L Win Ratio 57% / Mordekaiser - 130W 92L Win Ratio 59%, Shen - 1W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body: So I was playing a bot game with Shen , easy to find due to my champion picks. I was disconnected from my internet and I quit out, relogin, and played out the game. At the end though I received five 20 min leaver buster ques. I just wanted to know is there any way I can have these removed because I only quit out cause of connection issues, but I was able to come back and finished the game. Its really bother some to wait 20 mins just to que in.

replies.body: I too suffered a punishment from leaverbuster on a game I reconnected to on the last update.

An account can be marked by leaverbuster from any matchmade game.  AI vs. Coop still queues you up with other players, and leaving that game (regardless of intent)  can cause negative experiences for them.  Your standing with Leaverbuster can improve by completing your lower priority queue and playing consistently without interruptions.  More information can be found at our [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).  Hope that helps!
